title: Integrated Multimodal Learning Strategy for Temporal Information Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary understanding of time concepts and general comprehension of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Learners need training to analyze temporal information through integrated visual (arrows) and auditory (audio explanations) methods, with formative assessments to monitor learning outcomes regularly

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct the sequence of social phenomena with 80% accuracy by integrating audio descriptions and arrow symbols that indicate temporal flow
Learners can compare the strengths of two representation methods (audio/arrows) and select context-appropriate learning strategies
Learners can explain optimized combinations of representations that reduce mental effort when acquiring temporal information

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
